messages.content: Help Mims Davies deliver her plan for Mid Sussex.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Secure more funding for Mid Sussex's schools and support the sixth form college.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increasing education funding in Mid Sussex.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Back our local NHS and improve access to GP and dentist appointments.
Campaign for improvements to Mid Sussex's infrastructure to relieve road and rail congestion.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investing in local infrastructure to reduce traffic issues.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Support local businesses, ensuring Mid Sussex has more high quality local jobs.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Bolstering local businesses and job quality.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Cut crime by ensuring Sussex Police receives its share of the 20,000 new police officers.
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Increasing police resources to reduce crime.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Protect and enhance the environment and tackle climate change.
